review: Does everything I expected, Would have been nice if it charged off the TV power as opposed to having its own power supply.  That why I did not rate 5 stars.
author: Felicity MacDonald

review: I received the fire TV Stick as a Christmas present from my children.  I have been enjoying the numerous selections of movies and television shows it offers. No more loading and unloading DVD's. It's very easy to use and I can move it to any TV in my house.
author: V.B.H.

review: Low cost. Easy to install. Awesome. Strongly recommend.
author: tweety

review: Works great. Really convenient. I was then back that a power cord was needed but not a deal breaker.
author: franklin johnson

review: Instructions are easy to follow and if you are a prime customer, installation and activation is even easier.  It's so much easier to enjoy watching video material on a big screen rather than a tablet
author: hank

review: Very easy to set up and use.  I watch mostly amazon prime, netflix, (and hulu when I'm desperate, I hate commercials!), so this little gadget is perfect for me.  I have a Roku downstairs on our main TV and the Fire Stick is upstairs in my bedroom.  My router is at the opposite end of my house and downstairs but I have no buffering issues at all.  I'm very pleased with the fire stick and the price is perfect.
author: K. Murphy
